text:
@fred_guttenberg @RonSupportsYou Have you taken hydroxychloroquine?

Do you have a supply of hydroxychloroquine?

Do you have or have taken any other experimental medications to fight #COVID19?

How can anyone trust the @nytimes after you politicize a virus and American death?

The media never answers... Why?
